summary: This mod changes the strength of the Eye Adjsuting to 1. This should remove the annoying changing bloom when going from dark areas to light areas and visa versa. This does not affect blur in any way only the bloom from Eye Adjusting
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the strength of the Eye Adjsuting to 1. This should remove the annoying changing bloom when going from dark areas to light areas and visa versa. This does not affect blur in any way only the bloom from Eye Adjusting


Please leave any comments/feedback/requests below.
If you find a bug please give me som

NOTE: This mod is currently incompatible with the Realistic Lighting mod. Your game wont crash or anything but the effects off both wont be seen at the same time.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steam Workshop Link
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9995

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: PhilBro
